MINTOPOLIST TAX:
1% of all exchange tax generated, split among the owners of the 50 Mintopolist bases [those with the Mintopolist Card and Base recieve a double share].

1,792,459 $MM sold on exchange. 99 recipients (50 plots, 49 owned cards). 181.05 MM per recipient.

https://polygonscan.com/tx/0x3403035e16870c4f6a98561d67d635d1c044c6b4f99c877bb32254fa4e4f9d54
